verses.verse: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִ֤יד <WH1732> Furthermore David הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> the king לְכָל־ <WH3605> to the entire הַקָּהָ֔ל <WH6951> unto all the congregation שְׁלֹמֹ֨ה <WH8010> Solomon בְנִ֥י <WH1121> my son אֶחָ֛ד <WH259> whom alone בָּֽחַר־ <WH977> hath chosen בּ֥וֹ אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> God נַ֣עַר <WH5288> [is yet] young וָרָ֑ךְ <WH7390> and tender וְהַמְּלָאכָ֣ה <WH4399> and the work גְדוֹלָ֔ה <WH1419> [is] great כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֤א <WH3808> for לְאָדָם֙ <WH120> [is] not for man הַבִּירָ֔ה <WH1002> for the palace כִּ֖י <WH3588> for לַיהוָ֥ה <WH3068> but for the LORD אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> God

וּֽכְכָל־ <WH3605> all כֹּחִ֞י <WH3581> with all my might הֲכִינ֣וֹתִי <WH3559> Now I have prepared לְבֵית־ <WH1004> for the house אֱלֹהַ֗י <WH430> of my God הַזָּהָ֣ב ׀ <WH2091> the gold לַ֠זָּהָב <WH2091> for [things to be made] of gold וְהַכֶּ֨סֶף <WH3701> and the silver לַכֶּ֜סֶף <WH3701> for [things] of silver וְהַנְּחֹ֣שֶׁת <WH5178> and the brass לַנְּחֹ֗שֶׁת <WH5178> for [things] of brass הַבַּרְזֶל֙ <WH1270> the iron לַבַּרְזֶ֔ל <WH1270> for [things] of iron וְהָעֵצִ֖ים <WH6086> and wood לָעֵצִ֑ים <WH6086> for [things] of wood אַבְנֵי־ <WH68> stones שֹׁ֨הַם <WH7718> onyx וּמִלּוּאִ֜ים <WH4394> and [stones] to be set אַבְנֵי־ <WH68> stones פ֣וּךְ <WH6320> glistering וְרִקְמָ֗ה <WH7553> and of divers colours וְכֹ֨ל <WH3605> and all אֶ֧בֶן <WH68> stones יְקָרָ֛ה <WH3368> and all manner of precious וְאַבְנֵי־ <WH68> stones שַׁ֖יִשׁ <WH7893> and marble לָרֹֽב׃ <WH7230> in abundance

וְע֗וֹד <WH5750> Moreover בִּרְצוֹתִי֙ <WH7521> Moreover because I have set my affection בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> to the house אֱלֹהַ֔י <WH430> of my God יֶשׁ־ <WH3426> I have לִ֥י סְגֻלָּ֖ה <WH5459> of mine own proper good זָהָ֣ב <WH2091> of gold וָכָ֑סֶף <WH3701> and silver נָתַ֤תִּי <WH5414> [which] I have given לְבֵית־ <WH1004> to the house אֱלֹהַי֙ <WH430> of my God לְמַ֔עְלָה <WH4605> over and above מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all הֲכִינ֖וֹתִי <WH3559> all that I have prepared לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> house הַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> for the holy

שְׁלֹ֧שֶׁת <WH7969> [Even] three אֲלָפִ֛ים <WH505> thousand כִּכְּרֵ֥י <WH3603> talents זָהָ֖ב <WH2091> of gold מִזְּהַ֣ב <WH2091> of the gold אוֹפִ֑יר <WH211> of Ophir וְשִׁבְעַ֨ת <WH7651> and seven אֲלָפִ֤ים <WH505> thousand כִּכַּר־ <WH3603> talents כֶּ֙סֶף֙ <WH3701> silver מְזֻקָּ֔ק <WH2212> of refined לָט֖וּחַ <WH2902> to overlay קִיר֥וֹת <WH7023> the walls הַבָּתִּֽים׃ <WH1004> of the houses

לַזָּהָ֤ב <WH2091> The gold לַזָּהָב֙ <WH2091> for [things] of gold וְלַכֶּ֣סֶף <WH3701> and the silver לַכֶּ֔סֶף <WH3701> for [things] of silver וּלְכָל־ <WH3605> is for all מְלָאכָ֖ה <WH4399> and for all manner of work בְּיַ֣ד <WH3027> [to be made] by the hands חָרָשִׁ֑ים <WH2796> of artificers וּמִ֣י <WH4310> Who מִתְנַדֵּ֔ב <WH5068> And who [then] is willing לְמַלֹּ֥אות <WH4390> to consecrate יָד֛וֹ <WH3027> his service הַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> this day לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Jehovah

וַיִּֽתְנַדְּבוּ֩ <WH5068> offered willingly שָׂרֵ֨י <WH8269> Then the chief הָאָב֜וֹת <WH1> of the fathers וְשָׂרֵ֣י ׀ <WH8269> and princes שִׁבְטֵ֣י <WH7626> of the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel וְשָׂרֵ֤י <WH8269> and the captains הָאֲלָפִים֙ <WH505> of thousands וְהַמֵּא֔וֹת <WH3967> and of hundreds וּלְשָׂרֵ֖י <WH8269> with the rulers מְלֶ֥אכֶת <WH4399> work הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> of the king's

וַֽיִּתְּנ֞וּ <WH5414> And gave לַעֲבוֹדַ֣ת <WH5656> for the service בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> of God זָהָ֞ב <WH2091> of gold כִּכָּרִ֣ים <WH3603> talents חֲמֵֽשֶׁת־ <WH2568> five אֲלָפִים֮ <WH505> thousand וַאֲדַרְכֹנִ֣ים <WH150> drams רִבּוֹ֒ <WH7239> and ten thousand וְכֶ֗סֶף <WH3701> and of silver כִּכָּרִים֙ <WH3603> talents עֲשֶׂ֣רֶת <WH6235> ten אֲלָפִ֔ים <WH505> thousand וּנְחֹ֕שֶׁת <WH5178> and of brass רִבּ֛וֹ <WH7239> myriad וּשְׁמוֹנַ֥ת <WH8083> eight אֲלָפִ֖ים <WH505> thousand כִּכָּרִ֑ים <WH3603> talents וּבַרְזֶ֖ל <WH1270> of iron מֵֽאָה־ <WH3967> and one hundred אֶ֥לֶף <WH505> thousand כִּכָּרִֽים׃ <WH3603> talents

וְהַנִּמְצָ֤א <WH4672> were found אִתּוֹ֙ <WH854> for אֲבָנִ֔ים <WH68> And they with whom [precious] stones נָתְנ֖וּ <WH5414> gave לְאוֹצַ֣ר <WH214> [them] to the treasure בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD עַ֥ל <WH5921> in יַד־ <WH3027> by the hand יְחִיאֵ֖ל <WH3171> of Jehiel הַגֵּרְשֻׁנִּֽי׃ <WH1649> the Gershonite

וַיִּשְׂמְח֤וּ <WH8055> rejoiced הָעָם֙ <WH5971> Then the people עַל־ <WH5921> because הִֽתְנַדְּבָ֔ם <WH5068> for that they offered willingly כִּ֚י <WH3588> for בְּלֵ֣ב <WH3820> heart שָׁלֵ֔ם <WH8003> because with perfect הִֽתְנַדְּב֖וּ <WH5068> they offered willingly לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> to the LORD וְגַם֙ <WH1571> also דָּוִ֣יד <WH1732> and David הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the king שָׂמַ֖ח <WH8055> also rejoiced שִׂמְחָ֥ה <WH8057> joy גְדוֹלָֽה׃ <WH1419> with great פ

וַיְבָ֤רֶךְ <WH1288> blessed דָּוִיד֙ <WH1732> Wherefore David אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD לְעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> before כָּל־ <WH3605> of all הַקָּהָ֑ל <WH6951> all the congregation וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִ֗יד <WH1732> and David בָּר֨וּךְ <WH1288> Blessed אַתָּ֤ה <WH859> O יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> [be] thou LORD אֱלֹהֵי֙ <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <WH3478> of Israel אָבִ֔ינוּ <WH1> our father מֵעוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> ever וְעַד־ <WH5704> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> and ever

לְךָ֣ יְ֠הוָה <WH3069> God הַגְּדֻלָּ֨ה <WH1420> [is] the greatness וְהַגְּבוּרָ֤ה <WH1369> and the power וְהַתִּפְאֶ֙רֶת֙ <WH8597> and the glory וְהַנֵּ֣צַח <WH5331> and the victory וְהַה֔וֹד <WH1935> and the majesty כִּי־ <WH3588> indeed כֹ֖ל <WH3605> everything בַּשָּׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> for all [that is] in the heaven וּבָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> and in the earth לְךָ֤ יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> God הַמַּמְלָכָ֔ה <WH4467> [is thine] thine [is] the kingdom וְהַמִּתְנַשֵּׂ֖א <WH5375> exalt לְכֹ֥ל ׀ <WH3605> all לְרֹֽאשׁ׃ <WH7218> as head

וְהָעֹ֤שֶׁר <WH6239> Both riches וְהַכָּבוֹד֙ <WH3519> and honour מִלְּפָנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> [come] of thee וְאַתָּה֙ <WH859> and You מוֹשֵׁ֣ל <WH4910> and thou reignest בַּכֹּ֔ל <WH3605> all וּבְיָדְךָ֖ <WH3027> over all and in thine hand כֹּ֣חַ <WH3581> [is] power וּגְבוּרָ֑ה <WH1369> and might וּבְיָ֣דְךָ֔ <WH3027> and in thine hand לְגַדֵּ֥ל <WH1431> [it is] to make great וּלְחַזֵּ֖ק <WH2388> and to give strength לַכֹּֽל׃ <WH3605> everyone

וְעַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> Now אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <WH430> Now therefore our God מוֹדִ֥ים <WH3034> we thank אֲנַ֖חְנוּ <WH587> ourselves לָ֑ךְ וּֽמְהַֽלְלִ֖ים <WH1984> thee and praise לְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> name תִּפְאַרְתֶּֽךָ׃ <WH8597> thy glorious

וְכִ֨י <WH3588> But מִ֤י <WH4310> who אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I וּמִ֣י <WH4310> who עַמִּ֔י <WH5971> But who [am] I and what [is] my people כִּֽי־ <WH3588> should נַעְצֹ֣ר <WH6113> that we should be כֹּ֔חַ <WH3581> able לְהִתְנַדֵּ֖ב <WH5068> to offer so willingly כָּזֹ֑את <WH2063> likewise כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מִמְּךָ֣ <WH4480> at הַכֹּ֔ל <WH3605> things וּמִיָּדְךָ֖ <WH3027> after this sort? for all things [come] of thee and of thine own נָתַ֥נּוּ <WH5414> have we given לָֽךְ׃

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for גֵרִ֨ים <WH1616> For we [are] strangers אֲנַ֧חְנוּ <WH587> we לְפָנֶ֛יךָ <WH6440> before וְתוֹשָׁבִ֖ים <WH8453> thee and sojourners כְּכָל־ <WH3605> all אֲבֹתֵ֑ינוּ <WH1> as [were] all our fathers כַּצֵּ֧ל ׀ <WH6738> [are] as a shadow יָמֵ֛ינוּ <WH3117> our days עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> on the earth וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> and there מִקְוֶֽה׃ <WH4723> and [there is] none abiding

יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <WH430> our God כֹ֣ל <WH3605> all הֶהָמ֤וֹן <WH1995> all this store הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> this אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> we הֲכִינֹ֔נוּ <WH3559> that we have prepared לִבְנֽוֹת־ <WH1129> to build לְךָ֥ בַ֖יִת <WH1004> thee an house לְשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> name קָדְשֶׁ֑ךָ <WH6944> for thine holy מִיָּדְךָ֥ <WH3027> [cometh] of thine hand [הִיא כ] (ה֖וּא <WH1931> he ק) וּלְךָ֥ הַכֹּֽל׃ <WH3605> and all

וְיָדַ֣עְתִּי <WH3045> I know אֱלֹהַ֔י <WH430> also my God כִּ֤י <WH3588> for אַתָּה֙ <WH859> you בֹּחֵ֣ן <WH974> that thou triest לֵבָ֔ב <WH3824> the heart וּמֵישָׁרִ֖ים <WH4339> As for me in the uprightness תִּרְצֶ֑ה <WH7521> and hast pleasure אֲנִ֗י <WH589> I בְּיֹ֤שֶׁר <WH3476> in uprightness לְבָבִי֙ <WH3824> of mine heart הִתְנַדַּ֣בְתִּי <WH5068> I have willingly offered כָל־ <WH3605> all אֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> now עַמְּךָ֙ <WH5971> thy people הַנִּמְצְאוּ־ <WH4672> which are present פֹ֔ה <WH6311> here רָאִ֥יתִי <WH7200> all these things and now have I seen בְשִׂמְחָ֖ה <WH8057> with joy לְהִֽתְנַדֶּב־ <WH5068> here to offer willingly לָֽךְ׃

יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> O LORD אֱ֠לֹהֵי <WH430> God אַבְרָהָ֞ם <WH85> of Abraham יִצְחָ֤ק <WH3327> Isaac וְיִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> and of Israel אֲבֹתֵ֔ינוּ <WH1> our fathers שֳׁמְרָה־ <WH8104> keep זֹּ֣את <WH2063> likewise לְעוֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> this for ever לְיֵ֥צֶר <WH3336> in the imagination מַחְשְׁב֖וֹת <WH4284> of the thoughts לְבַ֣ב <WH3824> of the heart עַמֶּ֑ךָ <WH5971> of thy people וְהָכֵ֥ן <WH3559> and prepare לְבָבָ֖ם <WH3824> their heart אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH413> about

וְלִשְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <WH8010> unto Solomon בְנִ֗י <WH1121> my son תֵּ֚ן <WH5414> And give לֵבָ֣ב <WH3824> heart שָׁלֵ֔ם <WH8003> a perfect לִשְׁמוֹר֙ <WH8104> to keep מִצְוֹתֶ֔יךָ <WH4687> thy commandments עֵדְוֹתֶ֖יךָ <WH5715> thy testimonies וְחֻקֶּ֑יךָ <WH2708> appointed וְלַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> and to do הַכֹּ֔ל <WH3605> all וְלִבְנ֖וֹת <WH1129> all [these things] and to build הַבִּירָ֥ה <WH1002> the palace אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which הֲכִינֽוֹתִי׃ <WH3559> [for] the which I have made provision פ

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִיד֙ <WH1732> And David לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all הַקָּהָ֔ל <WH6951> to all the congregation בָּֽרְכוּ־ <WH1288> Now bless נָ֖א <WH4994> Now אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <WH430> your God וַיְבָרֲכ֣וּ <WH1288> blessed כָֽל־ <WH3605> and all הַקָּהָ֗ל <WH6951> And all the congregation לַיהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God אֲבֹֽתֵיהֶ֔ם <WH1> of their fathers וַיִּקְּד֧וּ <WH6915> and bowed down their heads וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲו֛וּ <WH7812> and worshipped לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD וְלַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> and the king

וַיִּזְבְּח֣וּ <WH2076> And they sacrificed לַיהוָ֣ה ׀ <WH3068> unto the LORD זְ֠בָחִים <WH2077> sacrifices וַיַּעֲל֨וּ <WH5927> and offered עֹל֜וֹת <WH5930> burnt offerings לַיהוָ֗ה <WH3068> unto the LORD לְֽמָחֳרַת֮ <WH4283> on the morrow הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> after that day הַהוּא֒ <WH1931> he פָּרִ֨ים <WH6499> bullocks אֶ֜לֶף <WH505> [even] a thousand אֵילִ֥ים <WH352> rams אֶ֛לֶף <WH505> a thousand כְּבָשִׂ֥ים <WH3532> lambs אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> [and] a thousand וְנִסְכֵּיהֶ֑ם <WH5262> with their drink offerings וּזְבָחִ֥ים <WH2077> and sacrifices לָרֹ֖ב <WH7230> in abundance לְכָל־ <WH3605> for all יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> for all Israel

וַיֹּאכְל֨וּ <WH398> And did eat וַיִּשְׁתּ֜וּ <WH8354> and drink לִפְנֵ֧י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> the LORD בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> on that day הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he בְּשִׂמְחָ֣ה <WH8057> gladness גְדוֹלָ֑ה <WH1419> with great וַיַּמְלִ֤יכוּ <WH4427> king שֵׁנִית֙ <WH8145> the second time לִשְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <WH8010> And they made Solomon בֶן־ <WH1121> the son דָּוִ֔יד <WH1732> of David וַיִּמְשְׁח֧וּ <WH4886> and anointed לַיהוָ֛ה <WH3068> [him] unto the LORD לְנָגִ֥יד <WH5057> [to be] the chief governor וּלְצָד֖וֹק <WH6659> and Zadok לְכֹהֵֽן׃ <WH3548> [to be] priest

וַיֵּ֣שֶׁב <WH3427> sat on שְׁ֠לֹמֹה <WH8010> Then Solomon עַל־ <WH5921> on כִּסֵּ֨א <WH3678> the throne יְהוָ֧ה ׀ <WH3068> of the LORD לְמֶ֛לֶךְ <WH4428> as king תַּֽחַת־ <WH8478> instead דָּוִ֥יד <WH1732> instead of David אָבִ֖יו <WH1> his father וַיַּצְלַ֑ח <WH6743> and prospered וַיִּשְׁמְע֥וּ <WH8085> obeyed אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> and כָּל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> and all Israel
